channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: China’s Pony.ai plans to triple global robotaxi fleet by the end of 2026
item.description: The Chinese autonomous vehicle company Pony.ai has global ambitions, and plans to build a 3,000-strong robotaxi fleet to meet them.

item.title: Amazon brade un tas de produits Tech pour la Black Friday Week : les 22 offres à retenir
item.description: Amazon n’hésite pas à casser les prix de nombreuses références sur son site lors de la Black Friday Week. Il y aura forcément de quoi vous faire plaisir : retrouvez ici les meilleures offres qui valent le coup.

item.title: Le Samsung Galaxy S25 est à moins de 500 € grâce à cette offre du Black Friday (-48 %)
item.description: Pour la Black Friday Week, Orange sort une offre immanquable sur le récent Samsung Galaxy S25 avec un bonus de reprise qui le fait passer de 959 euros à seulement 499 euros.

item.title: A 30% discount on the Xbox Elite Series 2 controller is one heck of a Black Friday deal
item.description: This Black Friday, the Xbox Elite Series 2 controller has finally come down to a price I can recommend it at - save up to 34%.

item.title: Fnac et Darty font le plein de bonnes affaires lors de la Black Friday Week : voici les 16 meilleures offres
item.description: La Black Week bat son plein chez la Fnac et Darty. Les deux enseignes proposent en continu de nouvelles offres. Pour ne rien manquer et profiter dès maintenant des meilleures réductions, découvrez la sélection des offres incontournables à saisir sans tarder, avant épuisement des stocks et la fin de l’événement.

item.title: Mission de sauvetage réussie : la Chine livre une capsule de secours à sa station spatiale Tiangong
item.description: Frayeur et réactivité dans l'espace. Après une collision avec un débris orbital, la Chine a dû lancer en urgence une mission non habitée pour sécuriser le retour de ses astronautes. Le vaisseau Shenzhou-22 est bien arrivé à bon port ce 25 novembre.

item.title: Test du Ugreen NASync DXP4800 Plus : Synology et QNAP ont clairement du souci à se faire
item.description: J'ai passé deux mois avec le Ugreen DXP4800 Plus, un NAS à 700 euros qui promet beaucoup sur le papier. Processeur Intel 12ᵉ génération, RAM DDR5, Ethernet 10 Gigabit : des caractéristiques qu'on trouve habituellement à 1000 euros chez Synology ou QNAP.

item.title: This Black Friday PS5 deal proves that the console wars are truly over: a PS5 is only £10 more than an Xbox Series S
item.description: There's only one console to buy this Black Friday, with a PS5 now costing only a tenner more than an Xbox Series S.

item.title: You can pick up a PSVR 2 headset and one of its best games for a lowest-ever price in the UK and US for Black Friday
item.description: The PSVR 2 is now at its lowest ever price in the US and the UK thanks to some excellent Black Friday deals. Here's the cheapest offers to pick up today.

item.title: Boulanger fait sa grande braderie pendant la Black Friday Week : les 17 offres qui méritent votre argent
item.description: Avec la Black Friday Week, une nouvelle vague de promotions a déferlé chez les grands sites de e-commerce. Pour l'occasion, Boulanger n’hésite pas à baisser les prix de nombreuses références Tech. Voici les offres qui valent le coup.

item.title: Talk about an upgrade - Amazon is spending $50 billion on new AI and HPC hardware for the US government
item.description: Amazon’s $50 billion plan expands federal AI capacity, strengthens classified cloud regions, and accelerates scientific and security workflows.

item.description: I reviewed Apple's AirPods Pro 3 and I gotta tell you they're the real deal – which makes this saving all the more special!

item.title: Arturia’s AstroLab 37 crams 44 synths into a tiny keyboard
item.description: Last year, Arturia launched its first stage keyboard, AstroLab. Unlike a synthesizer, stage keyboards are more focused on delivering performance-ready presets than sound design. They're geared towards touring and performing musicians who need access to a range of sounds with minimal fuss, rather than bedroom tinkerers. But, while the first entries in the series were […]...

item.title: All of the best Amazon UK Black Friday deals – 60+ top offers on TVs, laptops, appliances, Kindles, and more
item.description: I've used my decade of experience covering the Black Friday sales to pick out over 60 of the best deals from the Amazon UK Black Friday sale.

item.title: Xbox has teamed up with Crocs for a limited-edition collection inspired by the game maker's biggest hits
item.description: Xbox and Crocs have announced a new collaboration that reimagines the console's iconic controller in an exclusive, limited-time collection.

item.title: Go home everyone, the Black Friday OLED TVs deals war has just been won by LG
item.description: The LG C5 is one of the headline TVs of Black Friday, and Crampton & Moore just dropped the 55-inch model to its lowest price to date.

item.title: Une semaine sans Facebook, et tout va mieux : l’étude interne gênante que Meta aurait préféré oublier
item.description: Meta savait que couper Facebook faisait du bien à ses utilisateurs. Le géant des réseaux sociaux aurait pourtant choisi de taire une étude interne qui établissait un lien clair entre son réseau social et des effets néfastes sur la santé mentale, selon une plainte déposée aux États-Unis.

item.title: Moins de 100 € en poche lors du Black Friday ? Voici les 15 meilleurs deals sans se ruiner
item.description: La Black Friday Week a déjà débuté et parmi les nombreuses offres, il est possible de se faire plaisir même avec un budget qui ne dépasse pas les 100 euros. Avis aux petits budgets, voici les meilleures offres qui valent le coup.

item.description: Microsoft is previewing default game profiles on its ROG Xbox Ally gaming handheld. The new profiles will automatically optimize frame rates and power consumption for 40 games, including Fortnite, Gears of War: Reloaded, Hollow Knight: Silksong, Forza Horizon 5, Minecraft, and others, saving you from manually tweaking game settings. The company had solidified itself as a major player in the streaming wars with massive hits like House of Cards, Orange Is the New Black, and a collection of live-action […]

item.title: Speechify adds voice typing and voice assistant to its Chrome extension
item.description: In the last 12 months, there has been a proliferation of voice detection tools, thanks to overall quality improvement in speech recognition models. Speechify is hitching its wagon to this train and launching its own dictation tool with support for English.

item.title: Solar-powered iLamp turns the humble lamppost into an AI hub
item.description: A British firm’s solar-powered smart streetlight could help solve AI’s growing energy and emissions problem by turning lampposts into decentralized data centers.

item.title: What enterprises should know about The White House's new AI 'Manhattan Project' the Genesis Mission
item.description: President Donald Trump’s new “Genesis Mission” unveiled Monday is billed as a generational leap in how the United States does science akin to the Manhattan Project that created the atomic bomb during World War II. The executive order directs the Department of Energy (DOE) to build a “closed-loop AI experimentation platform” that links the country’s 17 national laboratories, federal supercomputers, and decades of government scientific data into “one cooperative system for research.” The White House fact sheet casts the initiative as a way to “transform how scientific research is conducted” and ...

item.description: Quick, easy, and healthier ice cream at the push of a button? The Ninja Creami promises this and more, and right now it's at its lowest-ever price for Black Friday.

item.title: Apple TV profite du Black Friday pour baisser son prix sur 6 mois, l’occasion parfaite si vous n’avez jamais vu Ted Lasso ou Pluribus
item.description: Vous avez déjà écumé Netflix, rincé Prime Video et plié Disney+ ? Peut-être qu’il est temps de tenter la parenthèse Apple TV. Ici, on mise sur moins de volume, mais beaucoup plus de finesse, avec des séries et des films qui sentent la maîtrise, la mise en scène millimétrée… et même du foot. Oui, du vrai foot (enfin soccer). La plateforme diffuse la MLS, celui où Messi à poser valise. Et pour la Black Friday Week, l’abonnement tombe à 4,99 euros par mois pendant 6 mois. ...

item.description: Major record labels have been urging Spotify and other music streaming platforms to raise subscription prices, arguing that fees have not kept pace with inflation and remain low when compared to services like Netflix.

item.description: The successful implementation of a Zero Trust security strategy is determined by three factors: the speed of change, the speed of alignment, and the speed of response.

item.title: Diversification can’t make a strategy problem disappear. It just creates a different problem
item.description: Why successful acquisitions are harder than you think. I keep coming up against a logical fallacy in strategy that I feel compelled to address. The logic holds that when a company has a shareholder-unfriendly component of its portfolio – e.g. the business in question is cyclical, or it is low-growth or low margin – the company should diversify to make that business less-shareholder unfriendly. I take on the fallacy in this Playing to Win/Practitioner Insights (PTW/PI) piece entitled Diversification Can’t Disappear a Strategy Problem: It Just Creates a Different Problem. And as always, you can ...

item.title: Walmart’s secret to retail domination? Becoming America’s grocery store
item.description: Walmart’s grocery business is a Trojan horse, driving both low-income and affluent Americans into the store. You might think of Walmart as America’s quintessential big box store—the place you can get everything from Hanes T-shirts to large screen TVs to cleats for your kid’s soccer uniform.
